legalQuestion.bonus-text:
For a cancellation to be formally legal, it must:
  1. contain the correct contents,
  2. adhere to the correct form of writing,
  3. be signed by an entitled person,
  4. be delivered correctly
  5. not exist a works council or an existing works council must be heard correctly
